answers.text:
Pamela, check with Green Bay, WI Metro Fire Department. Contact Division Chief Melissa Spielmann.

author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is asking if anyone is familiar with/or ever heard of fire departments providing hospital to home follow-up visits?  That is, Fire departments providing home visits once a patient has been released from the hospital for follow-up care such as cardiac, EKG, etc; those things that can be done fire personnel in a person’s home.
Look forward to hearing from you.
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: fire departments providing hospital to home follow-up visits?
